title: account preferences
extract: Definition of 'Preferences' Definition: Preferences refer to certain characteristics any consumer wants to have in a good or service to make it preferable to him. This could be the level of happiness, degree of satisfaction, utility from the product, etc.
extract_html: Definition of 'Preferences' Definition: Preferences refer to certain characteristics any consumer wants to have in a good or service to make it preferable to him. This could be the level of happiness, degree of satisfaction, utility from the product, etc.
